ladder.api 0.0.1
  • Reference

RgbColor Object

RgbColor.Rd

RgbColor Object

Usage

RgbColor(red = NULL, green = NULL, blue = NULL)

Arguments

red

(number) The red component of the color, from 0.0 to 1.0.

green

(number) The green component of the color, from 0.0 to 1.0.

blue

(number) The blue component of the color, from 0.0 to 1.0.

Value

RgbColor object

Details

An RGB color.
